column5: My flyer lists this boat cover on sale this week.  I'm looking for something mainly for while my boat is parked outside in the driveway (stored inside during the winter) and I'm not really worried about trailering with the cover on.  Anybody have good or bad experience with this type of cover ?  http://www.canadiantire.ca/AST/browse/5/Sp...oat%2BCover.jsp
you won't get a better cover for the price if your just using it for storing in the driveway

Its a good cover for sitting in your driveway. I pulled my boat with one last year and the cam at the back broke and did a considerable amount of damage to my brand new motor. Needless to say I was pissed and took it back. The material is good quality, but be careful pulling with it.

I bought the one that was all blue from CTC a couple of years ago.  I left my boat on an electric uncovered lift for the winter with just that on it.  It worked great.  Just had to remove the snow so that it didn't build up too much.  I've also used it to just cover the boat in monsoon like conditions.  My boat was dry until I trippped and dumped the pooled water inside it. I do not trailer with it on.  All in all, yes it is a good buy.
i got one. go for it.

Yep get one....mine got a small tear in it from last years snow being so heavy it rubbed on my seat....I e-mailed Classic and told them the truth, that it was not their workmanship that it was my fault and all I wanted was a patch kit if they had one....the lady that I e-mailed back and forth with told me not to worry about it, send her in the make and model number and that they are going to send me out a brand new one.....Classic has great customer service!!!!!!!    Chrispy!
Good hear of the great customer service.
yea i got the All Blue one for my 17ft boat love it.  The straps hold great and repels water like a champ
Can you PM me Classic's email address please?
